section_title: REPORT OF THE EXECUTIVE BOARD OF THE CLEAN DEVELOPMENT MECHANISM
sentences: The Report on Guidance to the CDM Executive Board and its annex containing draft rules of procedure were presented to the COP Plenary on Friday, 25 October, and the decision was adopted by the COP on Friday, 1 November.
enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
